and
An operation that implements the boolean
and
. The function is used to combine arguments. Most often it is used to declare two or more conditions in one algorithm with the
if
or
iif
functions.
Syntax:
and
No parameters.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Arithmetic and boolean" tab.
Example
In this case, to get the value "true", the values of attributes "Counterparty" and " Conclusion template" should be filled in.
